content.question: for (int outer = 0; outer < n; outer++) { for (int inner = 0; inner <= outer; inner++) { System.out.print(outer + " "); } } If n has been declared as an integer with the value 4, what is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: 3.A: Determine the result or output based on statement execution order in an algorithm.
